landing.subtitle: Discover, share, and enjoy short stories in Hindi, English, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, Marathi, and more — all in one calm, distraction-free space.
landing.noSignup: No signup required — browse, imagine, and get inspired.
landing.snippetText: On a quiet Chennai night, under the yellow light of the tea stall, three strangers took turns finishing each other's stories — and none of them realised they were writing their own.
landing.ctaBody: From bedtime tales to midnight thrillers, your story deserves a home. Share it with readers across India.

about.title: About Stories of India
about.subtitle: A calm, modern platform celebrating India's storytelling heritage — from folktales told under banyan trees to micro-fiction written on mobile phones.
about.quote: India has always been a land of stories. From the Panchatantra to platform conversations, from temple inscriptions to Twitter threads — we are a civilisation that thinks in narratives.

values.multilingualDesc: Stories in Hindi, English, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, Marathi, and more — because every language has a voice.
values.writerFriendlyDesc: No gatekeeping. Share your first piece in a welcoming, distraction-free space.
values.genreDiversityDesc: From mythology and romance to thrillers and children's tales — India's storytelling has no boundaries.
values.accessibleDesc: Semantic HTML, keyboard navigation, colour contrast, and screen-reader support built in from day one.
